title: Hyundai flags concerns with 'changes' by Indian govt ahead of planned Rs 25,000 crore IPO
description: Hyundai, which plans to raise Rs 25,000 crore through the Indian stock market by selling a 17% equity stake in the local unit, flagged the importance of stable policies for confidently making technological upgrades. They also highlighted concerns about localisation norms like PLI for automotive technology, aiming to reduce import dependence and lower manufacturing costs with significant initial capital investments.
